In England, in the seven days to 30 May, there were 18,945 new confirmed cases (33.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 May, there were 13,603 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 39% (5,342 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 June is 3,931,158 (6,984.1 cases per 100,000 population).
